TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND TABLE_SCHEMA = #{tableSchema}
AND ( COLUMN_NAME LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" OR COLUMN_COMMENT LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" OR COLUMN_TYPE LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" )
